titles.title: A bill to amend the Food and Security Act of 1985 to authorize and direct the Secretary of Agriculture to establish a strategic forage reserve comprised of multiyear set-aside acreage.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Cotton, Rice, and Sugar.
Referred to Subcommittee on Livestock, Dairy, and Poultry.
Referred to Subcommittee on Wheat, Soybeans, and Feed Grains.

bill.summary: 8/11/1988--Introduced. Amends the Food Security Act of 1985 to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to establish an eight-million acre strategic forage (grass and legumes) reserve comprising set-aside acreage.
